resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106493</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106493</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204311</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Literature-based newspaper: Their Eyes were Watching God</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur-gegründete Zeitung: Ihre Augen 
überwachten Gott</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">journal Littérature-basé : Leurs yeux 
observaient Dieu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jornal Literatura-baseado: Seus olhos 
prestavam atenção ao deus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">giornale Letteratura-basato: I loro occhi 
stavano guardando il dio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία-βασισμένη στο εφημερίδα: Τα μάτια 
τους πρόσεχαν το Θεό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">periódico Literatura-basado: Sus ojos 
miraban a dios</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will create an Eatonville newspaper depicting the characters and events in Zora Neale Hurston's "Their Eyes were Watching God."</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer stellen eine Eatonville Zeitung 
her, welche die Zeichen bildlich darstellt und Fälle in Zora Neale 
Hurstons "ihren Augen überwachten Gott."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants créeront un journal d'Eatonville 
dépeignant les caractères et les événements dans leurs yeux de 
Zora Neale Hurston "observaient Dieu."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes criarão um jornal de Eatonville que
descreve os caráteres e os eventos seus olhos de Zora Neale Hurston 
em "prestavam atenção ao deus."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi creeranno un giornale di Eatonville 
che descrive i caratteri e gli eventi nei loro occhi di Zora Neale 
Hurston "stavano guardando il dio."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα δημιουργήσουν μια εφημερίδα 
Eatonville απεικονίζοντας τους χαρακτήρες και τα γεγονότα στη 
Zora Neale που τους Hurston's τα "μάτια πρόσεχαν το Θεό."</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes crearán un periódico de 
Eatonville que representa los caracteres y los acontecimientos en sus 
ojos de Zora Neale Hurston "miraban a dios."</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JENNIFER SWARTZ
FN:JENNIFER SWARTZ
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204311</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106493</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/literature-based-newspaper-their-eyes-were-watching-god</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
